actions.Password match: 两次输入的密码必须保持一致
actions.Passwords not matching: 您两次输入的密码不一致
actions.Connect Airbnb Message: 请将igloohome连接到您的Airbnb主要主机的帐户，而不是共同主持人的帐户
actions.FingerPrint Message: 用指纹快速登录，或者，您可以稍后在“账户设置”下进行设置。
actions.Touch Id Message: 用Touch ID快速登录，或者，您可以稍后在“账户设置”下进行设置。
actions.Face Id Message: 使用面部识别快速登入，您也可以稍后在“帐户设置”下进行设置.

pairing.Step 1: 请把手掌放到智能锁数字板，点亮数字板.
pairing.Step 1 padlock: Press any number to activate lock.
pairing.Step 1 euroRetrofit: Please keep the lock unlocked and hold the multi-function button until the lock is flashing blue.
pairing.Step 1 keybox: 请打开锁，并将手掌放到智能锁数字板，保持数字板常亮
pairing.Keybox warning: 在配对显示成功之前请不要关闭智能锁。
pairing.Scan: 选择要连接的蓝牙设备
pairing.Step 2: Select Lock Model: 第2步: 选择要配对的智能锁的类型
pairing.Step 3: Pair your device: 第3步: 配对您的智能锁
pairing.Step 3: Select Product ID: 第3步: 选择智能锁的内置ID
pairing.PAIRING_STEP_1: 拆开智能锁的电池面板
pairing.PAIRING_STEP_2: 请把手掌放到智能锁数字板，点亮数字板
pairing.PAIRING_STEP_2_KEYBOX: 请打开锁，并将手掌放到智能锁数字板，保持数字板常亮
pairing.PAIRING_STEP_3: 取出一颗电池，并重新安装上去
pairing.PAIRING_STEP_5_L: 在听到4次“哔”声后，等待2声“哔哔”
pairing.PAIRING_LOCKBOX_STEP_1: 请按逆时针方向打开电池盖。
pairing.PAIRING_LOCKBOX_STEP_2: 请用针插入第三和第四个电池中间的细缝，长按重置按键，保持2秒。
pairing.PAIRING_LOCKBOX_STEP_3: 完成以后 请按 下一步。
pairing.PAIRING_BOLT2_NON_FACTORY_STEP_1: 请找到位于智能锁【前组件的背面板】右上角开孔处的重启按钮。
pairing.PAIRING_BOLT2_NON_FACTORY_STEP_2: 请利用尖头工具按住重启按钮约20秒。
pairing.PAIRING_BOLT2_NON_FACTORY_STEP_3: 如果您需要更多帮助，请浏览igloohome联系客服页面的【帮助中心】。
pairing.PAIRING_MORTISE_NON_FACTORY_STEP_1: 找到位于电池盖右下方的重置按钮。
pairing.PAIRING_MORTISE_NON_FACTORY_STEP_2: 连同键盘上的#号键一起按下，直到听到哔哔声。
pairing.PAIRING_KEYBOX_2_STEP_2: 请使用锋利的物体按下位于第二和第三电池槽之间的复位按钮。坚持2秒钟。
pairing.PAIRING_PADLOCK_RESET_STEP_1: 取下电池盖后，查找位于小孔里面的复位按钮。
pairing.PAIRING_PADLOCK_RESET_STEP_2: 使用物品按下小孔里面的重置按钮，保持3秒，你将听到一个确认音。
pairing.PAIRING_BOLT2S_IGB4_RESET_STEP_1: 按住[清除]按钮和后退按钮(面板左下角)3秒，你将听到确认音。
pairing.PAIRING_MORTISE_IGM2_RESET_STEP_1: 取下电池盖，按住[清除]键和[R]键3秒后，会听到确认音。

errors.Try to turn bluetooth off and then on ag: 请关闭蓝牙功能，然后重新打开尝试一下
errors.We are unable to connect to the device s: 我们无法连接到您选择的设备
errors.The lock that you are trying to add has: 您想要添加的智能锁已经被另一个用户连接了
errors.Please get the previous owner to delete: 请让该设备当前的管理员删除智能锁。删除智能锁的选项可以在'管理家庭'的菜单中找到
errors.If you believe this to be in error, plea: 如果这是系统错误，请游览igloohome 联系客服页面的【帮助中心】。
errors.NOT_IGLOOHOME: 这不是igloohome的锁，不能和app配对
errors.Lock deactivated during pairing: 在配对期间禁止锁定智能锁
errors.Place palm over keypad to reactivate it: 请把手掌放在数字板上以重新激活智能锁
errors.NETWORK_ERROR_MSG: 系统遇到了错误，请检查您的网络，然后重新尝试。
errors.ENSURE_LOCK_ON: 请确保智能锁数字板的灯亮着再进行尝试。
errors.OWN_LOCK_ALREADY_PAIRED: 智能锁已经成功与您的账号配对。
errors.UNABLE_TO_COMPLETE_PAIRING_ERROR: 在配对您的智能锁时，出现了错误。
errors.The lock that you are trying to add has: 您想要添加的智能锁已经被阻止.

tabs.Invalid Keys: 所有使用过的和已过期的PIN密码
tabs.Invalid Keys New: 所有使用过的和已过期的密钥
tabs.Pending Keys: 所有未来时效性PIN密码,等待认领中的蓝牙钥匙和未更新的密码，请点击“更新”来更新密码状态
tabs.Pending Keys New: 所有已发出的，且还没有被认领的密钥

The update can take up to 10 minutes.
firmware.Please keep your internet connected with: Please keep your internet connected with the app open and place your phone near your lock
Please keep your internet connected with the app open and place your phone near your {{ecosystemType}}
Please keep your internet connected with the app open and place your phone near your {{ecosystemType}}
firmware.If there is an error during update, plea: If there is an error during update, please remove the batteries and put them back into the {{ecosystemType}}.
firmware.Unlock your lock and keep it open: Unlock your lock and keep it open
firmware.Please place your phone near your lock: Please place your phone near your lock.
firmware.Please place your phone near your fob: Please place your phone near your {{ecosystemType}}.
firmware.Please place your phone near your bridge: Please place your phone near your {{ecosystemType}}.
firmware.Please ensure that the lock is unlocked: Please ensure that the lock is unlocked before you proceed.
firmware.Firmware update is not available yet: Firmware update is not available yet.
firmware.Make sure the blue light on your Fob is: Make sure the blue light on your {{ecosystemType}} is flashing.
firmware.Please hold onto the settings button: Please hold onto the settings button if the blue light on your {{ecosystemType}} stops flashing.

access.exclude unclaimed ekey: 不包含无人认领的蓝牙钥匙
access.End time should be after start time: 结束时间应该在开始时间之后
access.Start should be before end: 开始日期应在结束日期之前.
access.The end date should not exceed one year: 结束日期须在开始日期的一年内
access.End date time should be current: 结束日期时间应为当前日期.
access.Start date time should be current: 开始日期时间应为当前时间
access.Start date time should be before end dat: 开始日期时间应在结束日期时间之前
access.End day must be within same week: 结束日期必须在同一周内
access.End date\/time must be after start date\: 结束日期/时间必须在开始日期/时间之后
access.Enter a new name for this PIN: 为这个PIN密码输入一个新名字:
access.LIMITED_ACCESS_VIEW: 由于网络连接信号弱，我们无法检索密钥列表，如果网络连接可用，请刷新页面
access.Please update activity log before regist: 注册门卡前请更新门锁的活动日志
access.Please Sync Status to update: PIN密码没有更新，请更新更新.
access.out of 285 PINs created: 您已经使用了285中的{{number}}个PIN密码
access.Bluetooth keys and PIN codes issued: 已创建的蓝牙钥匙和PIN密码
access.Share ekey message: 我已经给你发送了一个igloohome智能锁的蓝牙钥匙，请点击点击下面的URL链接获取.
access.duration ekey generated: 已生成时效性蓝牙钥匙
access.permanent pin generated message: 生成的PIN密码需要在24小时内使用至少一次才能激活。
access.weekly pin generated message: 生成的PIN密码（从生成时间开始）需要在24小时内使用至少一次才能激活.
access.weekday pin generated message: 生成的PIN密码（从生成时间开始）需要在24小时内使用至少一次才能激活.
access.weekend pin generated message: 生成的PIN密码（从生成时间开始）需要在24小时内使用至少一次才能激活.
access.monthly pin generated message: 生成的PIN密码（从生成时间开始）需要在24小时内使用至少一次才能激活.
access.duration pin generated message: 生成的PIN密码（从生成时间开始）需要在24小时内使用至少一次才能激活.
access.otp pin generated message: 生成的PIN密码需要在{{number}}小时内使用才能激活，否则失效。
access.duration ekey generated message: 请确保蓝牙钥匙在{{number}}个小时内能够被认领
access.Set your own PIN via bluetooth: 通过蓝牙设置您自己的PIN密码
access.All key cards look the same: All key cards look the same so don't forget to label them!
access.Step 1: Get your key card(s) ready: Step 1: Get your key card(s) ready
access.Step 2: Tap key card(s) on lock: Step 2: Tap key card(s) on lock
access.Step 3: Hold on to unlock until close si: Step 3: Hold on to 🔓 until 'CLOSE' sign appears.
access.Step 4: Press and hold the lock icon unt: Step 4: Press and hold the 'lock' icon until you hear a beep
access.You can add multiple cards at once: You can add multiple cards at once.
access.SMS Pin Activate: To Activate, please use once by: {{date}}

lock.Ensure that your bluetooth is turned on: 确保您的蓝牙是开启状态
lock.Tap your key card (s) on the key card re: 您可以点击一或多张卡片
lock.Enter # on the keypad: 在智能锁面板上按下“#”号键
lock.Press [Sync] below to update: 在本页面下点[Sync]图标来更新内容
lock.Enter a new name for this lock: 为这把锁输入一个新名字
lock.Go near lock: 请打开手机蓝牙，靠近并激活智能锁数字板
lock.Delete all PINs except for Master PIN: 删除智能锁主人PIN密码（管理员密码）以外的所有PIN密码
lock.RESET_LOCK_CONFIRM_MSG: 请确认您要重置智能锁？这将会删除目前所有的键盘密码。
lock.LOCK_RESET_SUCCESS_MSG: 智能锁已经被重置，可以生成新的键盘密码。之前生成的键盘密码不再有效
lock.Delete Lock Message: Place your phone near the lock to complete the deletion process.
lock.CONFIRM_DELETE_TEMPLATE: 您确认要删除门锁吗？请注意之前生成的密码仍然有效。
lock.Delete Lock Fail Message: {{lockName}} 已连接到 {{providerName}} 的列表 ，不能移除。 请断开与{{providerName}} 的连接，然后再移除 {{lockName}}。
lock.Sensor relock can be customised from 1 t: 自动上锁可以自定义1-180秒。
lock.We will attempt the lock rotation you se: We will attempt the lock rotation you selected to see if it works for your door
lock.This lock rotation doesn’t work for your: This lock rotation doesn’t work for your door.

alert.Unable to re-associate to a property of: Do note that you are unable to re-associate to a property of different region. Please re-pair to do that.
alert.Unable to Remove Home message: {{listingName}} 已经被连接至{{provider}} 无法被删除. 请在删除之前到您订酒店的预订单中断开和 {{listingName}}的连接.
alert.Unable to Remove Home message with lock: {{listingName}}有连接的设备，不能删除。在删除{{listingName}}}之前，请将设备与{{listingName}}解除关联。

provider.Disconnect Airbnb Listing Message: 您确定要断开与Airbnb列表的关联吗？它将删除与列表相关的所有预定，并且将不会处理未来的所有预定单

Managing access on the go: 随时随地管理您的家庭

亲爱的 {{guestName}}, 这是您的{{listingName}} 房源开门权限，从 {{startDate}} 到 {{endDate}}.
{{access_pin_list}}
Name: 名称
Select send PIN time: 您的客人接收密钥邮件的默认时间为入住时间前1小时。如需改变，您可以选择多个小时。
Select send PIN time2: Please select the number of hour(s) before check in time for your guests to receive their access message. The default is 1 hour.
Scan QR code to add key: 掃描QR code 以取得鑰匙
Customise email message: 如要查看发送给您的客人的欢迎或密码电子邮件的内容，请点击'测试欢迎电子邮件'或'测试密码电子邮件'按钮。电子邮件将发送到您注册的电子邮件地址。如要自定密码电子邮件，请点击“联系igloohome支援团队”

PAIR: 您已经成功配对了智能锁

LOG_CHANGE_VOL_VIA_BLUETOOTH: 音量大小已设置为级别 {{newValue}}
LOG_PIN_DELETE: 一个PIN密码"{{pinDescription}}" 已经被删除。

LOCK_VIA_KEYPAD_OR_BUTTON: You have locked the lock via keypad or function button.

Attempted_BREAK_IN: Intrusion detected on the lock. Please check immediately.

LINK_FOB: {{ecosystemType}} "{{name}}" has been added to the lock.
UNLINK_FOB: Lock has been unlinked from the {{ecosystemType}} "{{name}}"
BLOCK_FOB: {{ecosystemType}} "{{name}}" has been blocked from the lock.
DELETE_FOB_FROM_LOCK: {{ecosystemType}} "{{name}}" has been deleted from the lock.
UNLOCK_FOB: {{ecosystemType}} "{{name}}" was used to unlock the lock.
LOCK_WITH_FOB: {{ecosystemType}} "{{name}}" was used to lock the lock.
LOCK_VIA_KEY_OR_THUMBTURN: You have Locked via physical key or thumb turn.
UNLOCK_VIA_KEY_OR_THUMBTURN: You have Unlocked via physical key or thumb turn.

delete_card_error: 删除的钥匙卡可能仍然在App中显示，请重试。
add_card_error: 新增的钥匙卡可能没有在App中显示，请重试。
unlock_error: 无法连接到智能锁。请开启手机蓝牙，触摸数字面板唤醒锁，再次尝试
update mastercode error: 我们无法为您的锁设置管理员密码，请再试一次。
delete lock error: 您试图移除智能锁的时候出现了一个错误，请确保您的手机处在智能锁的蓝牙范围之内，稍后重试。
sync lock error: 我们在更新智能锁的时间时发生了一个错误，请确保您的手机在锁的蓝牙范围内，稍后再试
sync lock bt in progress error: 我们在同步智能锁的时间时发生了一个错误，请稍后再试
location_permission error: Please ensure that the Bluetooth and location are turned on, Bluetooth privacy is enabled, then try again.
use pin before: 如需继续操作，请使用PIN密码至少一次。
edit pincode error: 我们无法通过蓝牙连接智能锁，请触摸数字面板唤醒智能锁，确保数字面板上的灯一直亮着。如果问题反复出现，请检查手机蓝牙是否打开，或重启手机蓝牙。
network_error: 我们遇到了网络错误。请检查您的网络设置，然后再试一次。
invalid email: 请输入一个有效的邮箱。
invalid password: 请输入一个有效的密码。
pin creation limit reached error: PIN generation limit reached for this hour. Please wait till the next hour to generate more remotely. Alternatively, you may create PIN codes via Bluetooth.
key card creation limit reached error: Keycard creation limit reached. No further keycards can be added.
legacy pin creation limit reached error: PIN creation limit reached. Please delete all PINs to create more.

The igloohome Team
